original_title: アンノウンッ２ 心霊映像徹底追及
overview: The second horror video collection of a completely new approach! An inexplicable phenomenon recorded in a ghost image... In order to find out the "existence" and "controity" that are the cause, we will conduct a thorough interview in this work! This is not the number of recorded videos, but a revolutionary collection of psychic images that stick to the quality of the interview.
tagline: Illuminating the darkness hidden in the psychic phenomenon...
title: Unknown 2: Thorough Pursuit of Psychic Images
